en: One day Jesus and his disciples crossed the lake.
A sudden storm placed them in danger.

lines: “Let us go over to the other side of the lake.”
So they got into a boat and set out.
As they sailed, he fell asleep.
A squall came down on the lake,
so that the boat was being swamped,
and they were in great danger.
The disciples went and woke him, saying,
“Master, Master, we are going to drown!”
He got up and rebuked the wind
“Where is your faith?” he asked his disciples.
In fear and amazement they asked one another,
He commands even the winds and the water,

question.en: Why do you think the disciples ask, 'Who is this?'—and what leads them to that question?
